title: Smashing Pumpkins - Reading Festival 1995 (Glacier Music)
description:
Smashing Pumpkins
Live at the Reading Festival 1995

Venue: Reading Festival
Location: Berkshire, United Kingdom
Date: August 25, 1995
Attendance: 65,000

1 Jellybelly
2 Zero
3 Today
4 Disarm
5 Fuck You (An Ode to No One)
6 Bullet with Butterfly Wings
7 Porcelina of the Vast Oceans
8 Geek U.S.A.
9 Rocket
10 Thru the Eyes of Ruby
11 Siva
12 Cherub Rock
13 Mayonaise
14 X.Y.U.

The band: 	

Billy Corgan (vocals, guitar)
James Iha (guitar)
D&#039;arcy Wretzky (bass)
Jimmy Chamberlin (drums)

The concert:

The Pumpkins headlined the Reading Festival in August 1995 nearly two months before the release of their highly anticipated double album Mellon Collie and the Infinite Sadness. Despite this, the band played mostly new songs. "Ruby" and "X.Y.U." are performed live only for the second time at this concert. 

The songs:

"Today", "Disarm", "Geek U.S.A.", "Rocket", "Cherub Rock" and "Mayonaise" are from Siamese Dream, "Siva" is from "Gish" and all other songs performed are from the upcoming double album "Mellon Collie and the Infinite Sadness". 

More info:

Set list: http://www.spfc.org/tours/date.html?tour_id=391
Official website: http://www.smashingpumpkins.com
